definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

containing_words.word: 皇家加勒比海游轮公司

sentences.english: so we're relatively rich into, in the Caribbean, you know.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们在加勒比海地区算是比较富有的。

sentences.english: The Caribbean waters there are also perfect for scuba diving.
sentences.chinese: 那里的加勒比海域也非常适合进行斯库巴潜水。

sentences.english: The sinking of the Caribbecomea gretos has stgreingestedd on the islinvolving course St. Vincent.
sentences.chinese: 加勒比海的下沉仍然从圣文森特岛起源。

sentences.english: This time though, it stuck at a port at the Caribbean Island of Saint Martin.
sentences.chinese: 不过这次邮轮被困在加勒比海圣马丁岛的港口。

sentences.english: We took a cruise in the Carribbean.
sentences.chinese: 我们在加勒比海上作了一次环游。

sentences.english: A lawyer and an engineer were fishing in the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: 一个律师与一个工程师在加勒比海边钓鱼。

sentences.english: A moray eel lurks outside a cage full of fish in the Caribbean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 在加勒比海，一条海鳗潜伏在装满鱼笼子的外面。

sentences.english: Social network for connecting Africans and Caribbeans at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 社会网络连接了海内外的非洲人和加勒比海人。

sentences.english: The passion of Carribean Islands. Fruity and refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 来自于加勒比海岸的激情，水果味，新鲜的感觉。

sentences.english: The much larger North American plate moves westward relative to the Caribbean plate.
sentences.chinese: 面积更大的北美板块向西移动靠近加勒比海板块。

sentences.english: Guana Island in the British Virgin Islands is one of the few Caribbean islands available for rent.
sentences.chinese: Guana岛是加勒比海少数可供出租的岛屿。

sentences.english: He studies giant barrel sponges growing on coral reefs in the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: 他主要研究生长于加勒比海珊瑚礁上的圆桶海绵。

sentences.english: Pilar was designed for catching big fish in the Caribbean.
sentences.chinese: “皮拉尔号”原本是用来去加勒比海捕鱼的。

sentences.english: Looking for the last unspoiled beaches in the Caribbean?
sentences.chinese: 正在寻找加勒比海一带最后未遭破坏的海滩吗？

sentences.english: We took a cruise ship around the Caribbean for a week.
sentences.chinese: 我们乘坐旅游船在加勒比海玩了一个星期。

sentences.english: Ida has regained strength after crossing land and re-entering the Caribbean Sea.
sentences.chinese: “伊达”登陆过境后，恢复其强势，重返加勒比海。
